---
name: Documentation Issue
about: Report missing or incorrect documentation
title: '[DOCS] '
labels: documentation
assignees: ''

---

## Documentation Issue

### Location
Where is the documentation issue? (file path, URL, or section)

### Issue Type
- [ ] Missing documentation
- [ ] Incorrect information
- [ ] Unclear/confusing
- [ ] Typo/grammar
- [ ] Outdated information

### Description
What's wrong or missing?

### Suggested Fix
How should the documentation be improved?

### Additional Context
Any relevant links, examples, or screenshots.
